Term.Name: Broadcast simulcast
Term.Definition: A simulcast of a service or event delivered using DVB-C/S/T

Term.Name: Provider-scheduled service
Term.Definition: A scheduled service other than a broadcast simulcast with scheduled times determined by the service provider

Term.Name: Concurrent live
Term.Definition: A service other than a broadcast simulcast or provider-scheduled service carrying a concurrent transmission of a live event

Term.Name: Other, recording permitted
Term.Definition: A service other than a broadcast simulcast, provider-scheduled service or concurrent live transmission for which the provider wishes to allow recording

Term.Name: Other, recording not permitted
Term.Definition: A service other than a broadcast simulcast, provider-scheduled service or concurrent live transmission for which the provider does not grant permission for recording
